sen.j: 田所弘人（たどころひろと、生没年不詳）は壬生浪士、新選組の隊士である。
sen.e: Hiroto TADOKORO (year of birth and death unknown) was a member of Mibu Roshi (masterless samurai group of Mibu) and also a member the Shinsengumi (a Tokugawa shogunate police force located in Kyoto).
Hiroto TADOKORO (year of birth and death unknown) was a member of Mibu Roshi (masterless samurai group of Mibu) and also a member the Shinsengumi (a Tokugawa shogunate police force located in Kyoto).
Hiroto TADOKORO (year of birth and death unknown) was a member of Mibu Roshi (masterless samurai group of Mibu) and also a member the Shinsengumi (a Tokugawa shogunate police force located in Kyoto).

sen.j: 文久三年五月頃に入隊し、同月二十五日の「幕府提出上書署名者一覧」に名前を連ねる。
sen.e: He joined the corps in around June 1863, and his name was on the 'Bakufu Teishutsu Josho Shomeisha Ichiran' (List of Signers for Official Documents Submitted to the Shogunate) which was submitted on July 10, 1863.

He joined the corps in around June 1863, and his name was on the 'Bakufu Teishutsu Josho Shomeisha Ichiran' (List of Signers for Official Documents Submitted to the Shogunate) which was submitted on July 10, 1863.

He joined the corps in around June 1863, and his name was on the 'Bakufu Teishutsu Josho Shomeisha Ichiran' (List of Signers for Official Documents Submitted to the Shogunate) which was submitted on July 10, 1863.

sen.j: 同年の八月十八日の政変に参加。
sen.e: In the same year, he participated in the Coup of August 18.
In the same year, he participated in the Coup of August 18.
In the same year, he participated in the Coup of August 18.

sen.j: 以後、池田屋事件までに脱走したものと見られている
sen.e: It is thought that he deserted the corps by the time that the Ikedaya Incident occurred.
It is thought that he deserted the corps by the time that the Ikedaya Incident occurred.
